overview: Chen Yuanyuan, courtesy name Wanfen, originally surnamed Xing Mingyuan's mother died early, and adopted her adoptive mother's surname Chen. Yuanyuan was good at singing and dancing, and when she was the best in color, she was called one of the "Eight Beauties of the South of the Yangtze River".
title: Chinese Four Given Names People Prostitute: Chen Yuanyuan
